roleset.name: full of, afflicted by
roleset.note: RIDDEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ridden' based on ebn instances. (from ridden.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: oh the angst
example.text: Life on the homefront seems *-1 the same at Farmer's Market in Los Angeles, but it's more angst ridden.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: [The Libyan central bank]-1 is state owned and unlike banks in the west is now owned by the elite or ridden *-1 by debt .
